bug.author: tconkling
bug.description: It looks like [s3] keyPrefix=... isn't making it into the URLs being fetched from S3. This is the address of a manifest protobuf we want to fetch: https://yelp-people-dev.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/~dqn/st/0.49.0-A8NT/reports/NJphBiGR4twz88mU9wTegn/manifest.pb And this is the address that's being generated: https://yelp-people-dev.s3.amazonaws.com/~dqn/reports/NJphBiGR4twz88mU9wTegn/manifest.pb The generated address is missing the st/<streamlit version> bits. Looks like we're splitting on a forward slash on the pathname in ConnectionManager.fetchManifest, which is giving us the wrong result because the keyPrefix itself has a forward slash.
